trans-unit.source: Provides the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> class and the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UserControl"></xref> class with a base set of functionality.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>類別和<xref href="System.Web.UI.UserControl"></xref>類別具有一組基本功能。

trans-unit.source: The TemplateControl class is an abstract class that provides common properties and methods for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class and the <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> class.
trans-unit.target: TemplateControl 類別是抽象類別，提供通用的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>類別和<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the TemplateControl is not created directly.
trans-unit.target: 不會直接建立新的執行個體的 TemplateControl。

trans-unit.source: The TemplateControl class defines methods supporting declarative data-binding expressions: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.Eval%2A> method for data-binding expression involving data sources, such as simple properties or expressions.
trans-unit.target: TemplateControl 類別會定義支援宣告式資料繫結運算式的方法:-使用<xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.Eval%2A>方法牽涉到資料來源，例如簡單的屬性或運算式的資料繫結運算式。</xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.Eval%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.XPath%2A> method for parsing and evaluating an XPath data-binding expression.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.XPath%2A>方法進行剖析和評估 XPath 資料繫結運算式。</xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.XPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.XPathSelect%2A> method for data-binding against an expression containing an XPath select statement.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.XPathSelect%2A>方法用於資料繫結包含 XPath 運算式對 select 陳述式。</xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.XPathSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The result is a node collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 結果是節點集合中實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: For more information on data-binding expression, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca) and [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: 如需資料繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結運算式語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)和[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The TemplateControl constructor is not called directly.
trans-unit.target: TemplateControl 建構函式不會直接呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user ends a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者結束交易。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the application-relative, virtual directory path to the file from which the control is parsed and compiled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要從中剖析和編譯控制項檔案的應用程式相對虛擬目錄路徑。

trans-unit.source: When the file that defines a <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl> control resides in a directory other than that of the page processing the request, use the AppRelativeVirtualPath property to return the application-relative, virtual path to the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl>.
trans-unit.target: 當定義<xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl>控制項所在的目錄中以外之網頁的處理要求，使用 AppRelativeVirtualPath 屬性以傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl>的應用程式相對的虛擬路徑</xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl>的檔案

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property is set based on the virtual path that is set in the AppRelativeVirtualPath property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A>屬性會根據設定 AppRelativeVirtualPath 屬性中設定的虛擬路徑。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path.
trans-unit.target: 表示路徑的字串。

trans-unit.source: The path that is set is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 設定的路徑是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The path that is set is not rooted.
trans-unit.target: 設定的路徑不被根目錄。

trans-unit.source: The AutoHandlers property has been deprecated in ASP.NET NET 2.0.
trans-unit.target: AutoHandlers 屬性已被取代 ASP.NET NET 2.0 中。

trans-unit.source: It is used by generated classes and is not intended for use within your code.
trans-unit.target: 它由產生的類別，並不適合您的程式碼內使用。

trans-unit.source: Always 0.
trans-unit.target: 永遠為 0。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a transaction completes.
trans-unit.target: 當交易完成時發生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Performs design-time logic.
trans-unit.target: 執行設計階段邏輯。

trans-unit.source: The Construct method allows design-time code execution of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> and <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> controls.
trans-unit.target: 建構方法可讓設計階段程式碼執行<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>和<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: Accesses literal strings stored in a resource.
trans-unit.target: 存取儲存在資源中的常值字串。

trans-unit.source: The CreateResourceBasedLiteralControl method is not intended for use from within your code.
trans-unit.target: CreateResourceBasedLiteralControl 方法不適合您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: The CreateResourceBasedLiteralControl method is used to access literal strings that are stored in a resource and is not intended for use from within your code.
trans-unit.target: CreateResourceBasedLiteralControl 方法用來存取儲存在資源中的常值字串，並不適合您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: The offset of the start of the string in the resource.
trans-unit.target: 在資源字串的開始位移。

trans-unit.source: The size of the string in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 字串，以位元組為單位的大小。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating if the string in the resource contains only 7-bit ASCII characters.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否在資源字串包含只有 7 位元的 ASCII 字元。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.LiteralControl"></xref> representing a literal string in a resource.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.LiteralControl"> </xref>代表常值字串資源中的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether themes apply to the control that is derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，表示主題是否適用於衍生自控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The EnableTheming property indicates whether themes are enabled for the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl> class.
trans-unit.target: EnableTheming 屬性指出是否啟用佈景主題，以供控制項衍生的<xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl>

trans-unit.source: When the EnableTheming property is `true`, the theme directory for the application is searched for control skins to apply.
trans-unit.target: 當 EnableTheming 屬性是`true`，要套用的控制項面板中搜尋應用程式的佈景主題目錄。

trans-unit.source: If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, skins are not applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果特定的控制項面板佈景主題目錄中，不會套用面板。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use themes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要使用佈景主題。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an unhandled exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 發生於時擲回未處理的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates a data-binding expression.
trans-unit.target: 會評估為資料繫結運算式。

trans-unit.source: The value of `expression` must evaluate to a public property.
trans-unit.target: 值`expression`必須評估為公用屬性。

trans-unit.source: The Eval method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
trans-unit.target: Eval 方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A>方法來解決針對評估運算式的物件參考。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The navigation path from the container to the public property value to place in the bound control property.
trans-unit.target: 將繫結的控制屬性中的公用屬性值從容器導覽路徑。

trans-unit.source: An object that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression.
trans-unit.target: 物件，從資料繫結運算式的評估結果。

trans-unit.source: The data-binding method can be used only for controls contained on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結方法只能用於上所包含的控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates a data-binding expression using the specified format string to display the result.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結使用評估運算式指定的格式字串來顯示結果。

trans-unit.source: The value of `expression` must evaluate to a public property.
trans-unit.target: 值`expression`必須評估為公用屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.Eval%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval%2A> method using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.Eval%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval%2A>方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A>方法來解決針對評估運算式的物件參考。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.Eval%2A>

trans-unit.source: The navigation path from the container to the public property value to place in the bound control property.
trans-unit.target: 將繫結的控制屬性中的公用屬性值從容器導覽路徑。

trans-unit.source: A .NET Framework format string to apply to the result.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 格式字串套用至結果。

trans-unit.source: A string that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression and conversion to a string type.
trans-unit.target: 評估的資料繫結運算式和轉換成字串類型的結果字串。

trans-unit.source: The data-binding method can only be used for controls contained on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結方法只用於控制項上所包含的<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the control that is derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化衍生自控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Do not override the FrameworkInitialize method.
trans-unit.target: 不要覆寫 FrameworkInitialize 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets an application-level resource object based on the specified <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey*> and <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*> properties.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式層級資源物件是根據指定<> *> 和<> *> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Application-level resources are stored in the App_GlobalResources folder.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式層級的資源會儲存在 App_GlobalResources 資料夾。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Resources in ASP.NET Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5a29f26b-d94d-48d9-864e-5ee8890dc265).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 應用程式中的資源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5a29f26b-d94d-48d9-864e-5ee8890dc265)。

trans-unit.source: A string representing a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey*>.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey*>.</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey*>

trans-unit.source: A string representing a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*>.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*>.</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*>

trans-unit.source: An object representing the requested resource object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示所要求之資源物件;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an application-level resource object based on the specified <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey*> and <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*> properties, object type, and property name of the resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式層級資源物件是根據指定<> *> 和<> *> 屬性、 物件類型和資源的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Application-level resources are stored in the App_GlobalResources folder.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式層級的資源會儲存在 App_GlobalResources 資料夾。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Resources in ASP.NET Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5a29f26b-d94d-48d9-864e-5ee8890dc265).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 應用程式中的資源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5a29f26b-d94d-48d9-864e-5ee8890dc265)。

trans-unit.source: A string representing a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey*>.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey*>.</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey*>

trans-unit.source: A string representing a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*>.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*>.</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*>

trans-unit.source: The type of object in the resource to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得的資源中的物件類型。

trans-unit.source: The property name of the object to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之物件的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the requested resource object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示所要求之資源物件;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a page-level resource object based on the specified <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得頁面層級資源物件是根據指定<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*>

trans-unit.source: Local resource files are stored in the App_LocalResources directory.
trans-unit.target: 本機資源檔會儲存在 App_LocalResources 目錄。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Resources in ASP.NET Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5a29f26b-d94d-48d9-864e-5ee8890dc265)
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 應用程式中的資源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5a29f26b-d94d-48d9-864e-5ee8890dc265)

trans-unit.source: A string representing a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*>.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*>.</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*>

trans-unit.source: An object representing the requested resource object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示所要求之資源物件;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a page-level resource object based on the specified <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*> property, object type, and property name.
trans-unit.target: 取得頁面層級資源物件是根據指定<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*>屬性、 物件類型和屬性名稱。</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*>

trans-unit.source: Local resource files are stored in the App_LocalResources directory.
trans-unit.target: 本機資源檔會儲存在 App_LocalResources 目錄。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Resources in ASP.NET Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5a29f26b-d94d-48d9-864e-5ee8890dc265)
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 應用程式中的資源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5a29f26b-d94d-48d9-864e-5ee8890dc265)

trans-unit.source: A string representing a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*>.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*>.</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey*>

trans-unit.source: The type of the resource object to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之資源物件的類型。

trans-unit.source: The property name of the resource object to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之資源物件的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the requested resource object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示所要求之資源物件;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Loads a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object from a file based on a specified virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 載入<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref>物件從檔案根據指定的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: If the control supports caching, the object returned from the LoadControl method is not actually a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object; rather, it is a <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果此控制項支援快取，從 LoadControl 方法傳回的物件不是實際<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>物件; 而是<xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: If the `virtualPath` parameter is relative, the path of the loaded control is relative to the path of the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`virtualPath`參數是相對，載入控制項的路徑是相對於<xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl>的路徑

trans-unit.source: When you load a control into a container control, the container raises all of the added control's events until it has caught up to the current event.
trans-unit.target: 當您載入容器控制項的控制項時，此容器會引發所有加入的控制項事件，直到它已在目前的事件。

trans-unit.source: However, the added control does not catch up with postback data processing.
trans-unit.target: 不過，加入的控制項無法趕上回傳資料處理。

trans-unit.source: For an added control to participate in postback data processing, including validation, the control must be added in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event rather than in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 必須在加入控制項的回傳資料處理，包括驗證，在要參與加入的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>事件而非在<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to a control file.
trans-unit.target: 控制檔案的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or empty.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬路徑是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或空白。

trans-unit.source: Loads a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object based on a specified type and constructor parameters.
trans-unit.target: 載入<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref>物件會根據指定的型別和建構函式參數。

trans-unit.source: If the user control supports caching, the object returned from the LoadControl method is not actually a <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> object; rather, it is a <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者控制項支援快取，從 LoadControl 方法傳回的物件不是實際<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>物件; 而是<xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>

trans-unit.source: When you load a control into a container control, the container raises all of the added control's events until it has caught up to the current event.
trans-unit.target: 當您載入容器控制項的控制項時，此容器會引發所有加入的控制項事件，直到它已在目前的事件。

trans-unit.source: However, the added control does not catch up with postback data processing.
trans-unit.target: 不過，加入的控制項無法趕上回傳資料處理。

trans-unit.source: For an added control to participate in postback data processing, including validation, the control must be added in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event rather than in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 必須在加入控制項的回傳資料處理，包括驗證，在要參與加入的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>事件而非在<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>

trans-unit.source: The type of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項類型。

trans-unit.source: An array of arguments that match in number, order, and type the parameters of the constructor to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 符合在數目、 順序和類型的參數叫用的建構函式的引數陣列。

trans-unit.source: If `parameters` is an empty array or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the constructor that takes no parameters (the default constructor) is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果`parameters`是空陣列或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，不接受任何參數 （預設建構函式） 的建構函式會叫用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.UserControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.UserControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Obtains an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> interface from an external file.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref>介面從外部檔案。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to a user control file.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項檔案虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the specified template.
trans-unit.target: 指定的範本執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.AbortTransaction"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.AbortTransaction"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.CommitTransaction"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.CommitTransaction"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the OnCommitTransaction method for any transaction processing logic in which your page or user control participates.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 OnCommitTransaction 方法的任何處理的邏輯網頁或使用者控制項所參與的交易。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.Error"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.Error"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Parses an input string into a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object on the Web Forms page or user control.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的字串剖析成<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref> Web Form 網頁或使用者控制項上的物件。

trans-unit.source: The `content` parameter contains a user control, such as you would find in an .ascx file.
trans-unit.target: `content`參數會包含使用者控制項，例如，您會發現.ascx 檔案中。

trans-unit.source: This string cannot contain any code, because the ParseControl method never causes compilation.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串不能包含任何程式碼，因為 ParseControl 方法永遠不會造成編譯。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a user control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: The parsed <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已剖析<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Parses an input string into a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object on the ASP.NET Web page or user control.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的字串剖析成<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref> ASP.NET Web 網頁或使用者控制項上的物件。

trans-unit.source: The `content` parameter contains a user control (the contents of an .ascx file).
trans-unit.target: `content`參數包含使用者控制項 （.ascx 檔案的內容）。

trans-unit.source: This string cannot contain any code, because the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.ParseControl%2A> method never causes compilation.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串不能包含任何程式碼，因為<xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.ParseControl%2A>方法永遠不會造成編譯。</xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl.ParseControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `ignoreParserFilter` parameter allows the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter> class to be ignored.
trans-unit.target: `ignoreParserFilter`參數可讓<xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter>類別被忽略。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter> class is used by the ASP.NET parser to determine whether an item is allowed in the page at parse time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter>類別可由 ASP.NET 剖析器來判斷項目中是否允許頁面是在剖析階段。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a user control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether to ignore the parser filter.
trans-unit.target: 值，指定是否要忽略剖析器的篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: The parsed control.
trans-unit.target: 剖析的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Reads a string resource.
trans-unit.target: 讀取字串資源。

trans-unit.source: The ReadStringResource method is not intended for use from within your code.
trans-unit.target: ReadStringResource 方法不適合您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: The ReadStringResource method is not intended for use from within your code.
trans-unit.target: ReadStringResource 方法不適合您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Reads a string resource.

trans-unit.target: ReadStringResource 方法不適合您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.target: ReadStringResource 方法不適合您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>要讀取的資源。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An object representing the resource.
trans-unit.target: 代表資源的物件。

trans-unit.source: Sets a pointer to a string resource.
trans-unit.target: 設定字串資源的指標。

trans-unit.source: The SetStringResourcePointer method is used by generated classes and is not intended for use from within your code.
trans-unit.target: SetStringResourcePointer 方法所產生的類別，並不適合您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the pointer to the string resource.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示字串資源的指標。

trans-unit.source: The resource size.
trans-unit.target: 資源大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl"></xref> control supports automatic events.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl"></xref>控制項支援自動事件。

trans-unit.source: The SupportAutoEvents property indicates whether automatic events are supported.
trans-unit.target: SupportAutoEvents 屬性會指出是否支援自動事件。

trans-unit.source: The SupportAutoEvents property is read-only and is `true` for all cases.
trans-unit.target: SupportAutoEvents 屬性是唯讀的而且是`true`所有案例。

trans-unit.source: Always<xref uid="langword_csharp_ true" name=" true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always<xref uid="langword_csharp_ true" name=" true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a parent/child relationship exists between two specified device filters.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出兩個指定的裝置篩選條件是否之間具有父子式關聯性。

trans-unit.source: The IFilterResolutionService.CompareFilters method is part of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IFilterResolutionService> interface, which is specific to how a control uses device filters in a designer environment.
trans-unit.target: IFilterResolutionService.CompareFilters 方法屬於<xref:System.Web.UI.IFilterResolutionService>介面，這是特定的控制項設計工具的環境中所使用的裝置篩選條件。</xref:System.Web.UI.IFilterResolutionService>

trans-unit.source: When controls are parsed or persisted in the designer environment outside the context of a browser request, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IFilterResolutionService> provides a way to determine if the current control is affected by a named filter and whether a named filter is part of a specific device-filter hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 剖析或在瀏覽器要求，內容以外的設計工具的環境中保存控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.IFilterResolutionService>提供一個方式來判斷目前的控制會受到具名篩選器以及指定的篩選器是特定的裝置篩選條件階層的一部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.IFilterResolutionService>

trans-unit.source: A device filter name.
trans-unit.target: 裝置篩選器名稱。

trans-unit.source: A device filter name.
trans-unit.target: 裝置篩選器名稱。

trans-unit.source: 1, if filter1 is a parent of filter2; -1, if filter2 is a parent of filter1; otherwise, 0, if there is no parent/child relationship between filter1 and filter2.
trans-unit.target: 1，如果 filter1 父系的 filter2 ，則為-1，如果 filter2 父系的 filter1 ; 否則 0，如果沒有任何之間的父子式關聯性 filter1 和 filter2 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified filter is a type of the current filter object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出指定的篩選條件是否為目前的篩選條件物件的類型。

trans-unit.source: The IFilterResolutionService.EvaluateFilter method is part of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IFilterResolutionService> interface, which is specific to how a control uses device filters in a designer environment.
trans-unit.target: IFilterResolutionService.EvaluateFilter 方法屬於<xref:System.Web.UI.IFilterResolutionService>介面，這是特定的控制項設計工具的環境中所使用的裝置篩選條件。</xref:System.Web.UI.IFilterResolutionService>

trans-unit.source: When controls are parsed or persisted in the designer environment outside the context of a browser request, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IFilterResolutionService> provides a way to determine if the current control is affected by a named filter and whether a named filter is part of a specific device-filter hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 剖析或在瀏覽器要求，內容以外的設計工具的環境中保存控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.IFilterResolutionService>提供一個方式來判斷目前的控制會受到具名篩選器以及指定的篩選器是特定的裝置篩選條件階層的一部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.IFilterResolutionService>

trans-unit.source: The name of a device filter.
trans-unit.target: 裝置篩選條件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified filter is a type applicable to the current filter object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的篩選器是適用於目前的篩選物件; 類型否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether a device filter applies to the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 傳回布林值，指出裝置篩選條件是否適用於 HTTP 要求。

trans-unit.source: The TestDeviceFilter method invokes the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.IsBrowser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: TestDeviceFilter 方法會叫用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.IsBrowser%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.IsBrowser%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on device filtering, see [Device Filtering Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關裝置篩選的詳細資訊，請參閱[裝置篩選概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The browser name to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的瀏覽器名稱。

trans-unit.source: if the client browser specified in filterName is the same as the specified browser; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端瀏覽器中指定 filterName 等同於指定的瀏覽器中; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Writes a resource string to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 寫入資源字串給<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The WriteUTF8ResourceString method is used by generated classes and is not intended for use from within your code.
trans-unit.target: WriteUTF8ResourceString 方法所產生的類別，並不適合您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: The control to write to.

trans-unit.source: The starting position within `value`.
trans-unit.target: 中的開始位置`value`。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters within `value` to use.
trans-unit.target: 中的字元數目`value`使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to bypass re-encoding; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>略過重新編碼。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates an XPath data-binding expression.
trans-unit.target: 評估 XPath 資料繫結運算式。

trans-unit.source: The XPath method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.XPathBinder.Eval%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
trans-unit.target: XPath 方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.XPathBinder.Eval%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A>方法來解決<xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>運算式評估的物件參考。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.XPathBinder.Eval%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression to evaluate.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.XPathBinder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Web.UI.XPathBinder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An object that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression.
trans-unit.target: 物件，從資料繫結運算式的評估結果。

trans-unit.source: The data-binding method can be used only for controls contained on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結方法只能用於上所包含的控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 資料繫結方法只能用於上所包含的控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates an XPath data-binding expression and returns a node collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 評估的 XPath 的資料繫結運算式，並傳回節點集合中實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The XPathSelect method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.XPathBinder.Select%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
trans-unit.target: XPathSelect 方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.XPathBinder.Select%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A>方法來解決<xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>運算式評估的物件參考。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.XPathBinder.Select%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 要評估的 XPath 運算式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.XPathBinder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Web.UI.XPathBinder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> node list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>節點清單。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Evaluates an XPath data-binding expression using the specified prefix and namespace mappings for namespace resolution and returns a node collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 評估使用指定的前置詞和命名空間對應的命名空間解析的 XPath 資料繫結運算式，並傳回節點集合中實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The XPathSelect method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.XPathBinder.Select%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> method to resolve the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object reference that the expression is evaluated against.
trans-unit.target: XPathSelect 方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.XPathBinder.Select%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A>方法來解決<xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>運算式評估的物件參考。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetDataItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.XPathBinder.Select%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 要評估的 XPath 運算式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.XPathBinder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Web.UI.XPathBinder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A set of prefix and namespace mappings used for namespace resolution.
trans-unit.target: 一組用於解析命名空間的前置詞和命名空間對應。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> node list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>節點清單。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>
